EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} - Confirmed: Toronto Community Appreciation Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We Can't Wait To See You At Turbofest Silicon Valley The AWS Loft | March 9, 2016 <[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-silicon-valley]]> {{Lead.First Name:default=}} Thank you for registering to attend Turbofest Silicon Valley! This email confirms your spot to attend this exclusive event at the AWS Loft in San Francisco.
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{company.Company Name:default=}} Turbofest Silicon Valley A Day of Cloud & Virtualization Thought Leadership An Evening of Stand-Up with Kumail Nanjiani of HBO's Silicon Valley If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <[[mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com]]>.
- The VMTurbo Team
